name: Birdwatching
description:
This game was made entirely by me in <48 hours as part of Ludum Dare 51.  The theme was EVERY 10 SECONDS.

How to Play

Type the scientific names for birds as they fly across the sky!

Case-insensitive, space-sensitive.

Birders rejoice!  A new bird can be seen every ten seconds, and you need to share your bird knowledge to everyone around before the bird disappears.  It's up to you to combine this most mighty of birding experiences with your own proficiency in bird-dom to let everyone know just how cool birds are!

Are you ready to WATCH some BIRDS?

Features
  • 24 digitally hand-drawn birbs!
  • So many bird facts!
  • A sweet birding bop!
  • Latin!
  • So much more!

Edit: Updated WebGL version to hopefully crash less!
